AproprosSection.SecondHeader: TAJ MOROCCAN FOOD - A MIX BETWEEN MODERNITY AND TRADITION.

Paragraphs.firstParag: Riad Andalous Food is an authentic 100% Moroccan restaurant, where you can savor refined cuisine in an elegant setting that skilfully fuses tradition and modernity.
Paragraphs.secondParag: Rue Jebel Ayachi near RÃ©sidence Saad 1, Taj Moroccan Food offers an exceptional culinary experience, where you can enjoy traditional Moroccan dishes of impeccable quality.

AndalousSect1.FirstHeader: COME AND DELIGHT YOUR TASTE BUDS
AndalousSect1.SecondHeader: Riad Andalous Food: the guarantee of an unforgettable explosion of flavors.

firstDiv.paragraph: The decor of the Riad Andalous Food restaurant in Casablanca, sidi Moumen is a harmonious blend of tradition and modernity, creating a memorably elegant and welcoming atmosphere for guests.

secondDiv.paragraph: Riad Andalous Food is a true paradise for lovers of Moroccan cuisine, offering a diverse and tasty menu that will delight your taste buds with authentic flavors and quality ingredients.
